snippet: The so-called Elk complex fire in Boise National Forest in Idaho has been identified as a top priority, while other blazes in Utah, Oregon, Washington and Montana are also threatening to cause damage to acreage and homes.
abstract: The so-called Elk complex fire in Boise National Forest in Idaho has been identified as a top priority, while other blazes in Utah, Oregon, Washington and Montana are also threatening to cause damage to acreage and homes.

headline.main: Multiple Wildfires Raging in Western States
